item.title: About me
item.description: Married, dad of 3 little girls, Software Engineer. I live in Switzerland and work at Adobe Basel. I speak Turkish, English, French and some basic German. I’m a full stack developer who likes to focus on every aspects of softwares. I have a keen interest in modern frontend development stacks. I like React, TypeScript, NodeJS, and modern TDD tools such as Cypress. Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask me on Twitter.
